resources.string: Insert the player\'\s name (20 letters max) and press "add" to add a new player. Do it as many times as players you want to add. Press "ready" when you finished adding all the players
Insert the description of the new challenge (100 letters max) and it\'\s value. Do it as many times as challenges you want to add. Press "ready" when you finished adding all the challenges
Please enter the amount of rounds you want to play
The amount of rounds must be higher than 0

Welcome!
 Before start playing, add as many players as you want.
 If you want, you can add personalized challenges too.
 Press start when you are ready
You must add at least 2 players
At least one of the fields is blank or contain a non valid character
The main idea of this game is to get drunk. This game is about challenges. Every challenge has a value of drinks, so when you complete it, you drink that amount of drinks.
There is a player with that name already
